Thanks everyone!  The set has been seprated and sold off!  It appears that I will be needing at least part of that money for our move in 2 weeks, so it worked out for my family in the long run.  Take care all!

Jimi

posts.post_title: 1887 n28 near complete set for sale -- SOLD!!

....so I will offer it up outright here for $6,100.  Good deal especially since it would cost you more to build the set one at a time.  I'll be glad to send scans of the backs too if you need to see them.  Thanks!

Jimi
